abstract: Citigroup‘s chief executive, Vikram Pandit, on Tuesday called for a “vigorous” debate on regulatory oversight as the crisis in the financial services industry continues, Dow Jones Newswires reported.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s chief executive, Vikram Pandit, on Tuesday called for a “vigorous” debate on regulatory oversight as the crisis in the financial services industry continues, Dow Jones Newswires reported.

headline.main: Pandit Calls for Debate on Financial Regulations
